results.content: Excellent. The course is well planned out and easy to follow, I would absolutely recommend it to others.
results.content_html: Excellent. The course is well planned out and easy to follow, I would absolutely recommend it to others.

results.content:
The lectures are high quality and the pacing is just right. In the first two modules we already learned how to setup a project and how to configure continuous integration through github actions. We are also exposed to react early on. 
Additionally we use tools like yarn with locked versions following best practices. And this is just the first two modules. 

If you are learning firebase and best practices, you like lectures that go straight to the point where you learn and use things right away: this is your course!

results.content: Excellent so far, 100% recommend, best firebase course on UDEMY hands down. Halfway mark now and im so glad i found this course, anyone looking to use firebase and wants a course which gets straight to the point with real world use case needs this course! thanks Jared and i look forward to more of your courses.
